description: This file defines a MenusProvider class that manages in-memory menu items for a Flutter app. It provides CRUD operations, toggling availability, and initializes with mock data. It acts as a state management class utilizing ChangeNotifier for reactive UI updates.

classes.name: MenusProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based class managing a list of MenuItem objects with operations to manipulate menu data in-memory.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable list of current menu items.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new MenuItem to the list and notifies listeners.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing MenuItem identified by id; does nothing if not found.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a MenuItem by id if it exists.

methods.name: toggleAvailability
methods.description: Toggles the availability status of a MenuItem by id.

methods.name: createMockItem
methods.description: Generates a mock MenuItem with optional custom name, category, and price, using random data.
